title: Guy stop complaining about the Zoe nerfs
body:
The average human reaction time is anywhere from .15 seconds to .30 seconds (give or take, just a rough number mind you). A quick player has time to react an entire extra time before a lvl 5 Zoe Q comes attcha again because of this nerf. Hell, at level one you can react to her like 4 extra times before it's off cd again. She's a burst mage for goodness sake, how do I live out the power fantasy of being a god among men if you give people all this time to react to me not having Q!?

Riot please buff Zoe's damage to compensate for this utter travesty.

you might be the only person that can detect sarcasm haha
